extension.name: RuposTel VirtueMart Ajax Search Pro
extension.author: www.rupostel.com
extension.description:
Virtuemart Ajax Search Module created by rupostel.com team.
Language variables that you may want to adjust:
COM_RUPSEARCH_NEXT="JNEXT"
COM_RUPSEARCH_HASNEXT="There are more products found than shown"

field.name: cache
field.label: Joomla Caching
field.description: Module caching is not supperted by this extension in order for head data to load properly.

field.name: internal_caching
field.label: Internal HTML caching.
field.description: Enable this feature so this component does not slow down your database queries. Remember to delete content of cache if any of your product names or links change

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug mode
field.description: Debug mode will not hide the results with timer automatically, you can use it to style CSS.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Add a class to the module

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-text
field.description: Text to appear before the search box

field.name: posttext
field.label: Post-text
field.description: Text to appear after the search box

field.name: include_but
field.label: Show 'Submit' button
field.description: Set this option to yes, if you want a button to submit the query to the VM search page.

field.name: add_next
field.label: Add Next Button to Category Product List (Link to more results).
field.description: Show Next button at the end of the category page

field.name: min_height
field.label: Min-height of module
field.description: Minimum height of the module without the results.

field.name: results_width
field.label: Results width in px (0 for 100%)
field.description: Set results width.

field.name: image_width
field.label: Image width in px
field.description: Set image width as an integer number.

field.name: image_height
field.label: Image height in px
field.description: Set image height as an integer number.

field.name: results_max_height
field.label: Results valid for width style property (incl px or %).
field.description: Example: 300px

field.name: resize_component
field.label: Resize component div
field.description: Set to No if your theme is fully responsive so the component section does not resize by calculation.

field.name: left_id
field.label: Left column area ID or class

field.name: right_id
field.label: Right column area ID or class

field.name: component_area_id
field.label: Component Area ID or class (check your theme).
field.description: If left empty, the drop down will be used.

field.name: button_class
field.label: Search button CSS class.
field.description: Set CSS class of the search button, if used.

field.name: search_input_class
field.label: Search input CSS class.
field.description: Set CSS class of the search input.

field.name: text_width
field.label: Search input width.
field.description: Set width of the search input.

field.name: custom_layout
field.label: Choose search input design
field.description: Choose whether to load input as shadow dom, or standard html5

field.name: only_in_stock
field.label: Search products in stock only
field.description: Search products in stock only

field.name: only_current
field.label: Search only current category
field.description: Will search only the current virtuemart category

field.name: cat_search
field.label: Display categories
field.description: If a category search is enabled, the search will be applied only per current category or category selected.

field.name: category_list
field.label: Category List IDs
field.description: By default module picks up all top published categories. You can override the list here by entering category IDs separated by a comma.

field.name: no_ajax
field.label: No ajax mode
field.description: When set to Yes, it will not show the drop down while typing. User has to press search or submit (enter).

field.name: optional_search
field.label: Optional search parameters
field.description: Choose if the checkbox to search PRODUCT DESCRIPTION should be available
field.option: Do not show and do not search product description
Do not show and search always product description

field.name: no_short
field.label: MOD_VIRTUEMART_AJAX_SEARCH_PRO_SHORTENING_LABEL
field.description: Shortened words may give a better results especially for adjectives

field.name: my_itemid
field.label: Itemid of the search results.
field.description: Set Itemid of the search results.

field.name: child_products
field.label: Child products handling
field.option: Include both child and parent products
Include only child products and products without child products (skip parent products)

field.name: order_byf
field.label: Sort by
field.description: Choose product sorting options
field.option: No sorting (Fastest, sorted only by relevance)
Sort by price (calculation plugins are not taken into account and only default shopper group is used)

field.name: use_fulltext
field.label: Add and use fulltext indexes (#__virtuemart_products_{lang}.product_desc, #__virtuemart_products_{lang}.product_s_desc, #__virtuemart_product_customfields.customfield_value).
field.description: Will alter the tables and use select match against queries.
